content.title: Intro
content.content:
1977 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar

Publication Information

Illustrator	The Brothers Hildebrandt
Publisher	Ballantine Books (US)
Released	1976
Format	Stapled calendar with mailer (13 x 121⁄4 inches)
ISBN	345-25135-0-495
Preceded by	1976 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar
Followed by	1978 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar

The 1977 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar was the official Tolkien calendar published by Ballantine Books in 1976. It features art by The Brothers Hildebrandt based on The Lord of the Rings.

content.title: Illustrations
content.content:
Cover - "Gandalf"
January - "Smaug"
February - "Goldberry"
March - "Rivendell"
April - "The Balrog"
May - "Lothlórien"
June - "Faramir"
Centrefold - "An Unexpected Party"
July - "Helm's Deep"
August - "Ghân-Buri-Ghân"
September - "Siege of Minas Tirith"
October - "The Healing of Eowyn"
November - "Cirith Ungol"
December - "The Wedding of the King"
